name: Mehen -Tomb of the Serpent
description:
Please download the builds below for the newest versions!

A game made for our "Issues in Game Studies: Survival Horror" class.
Find out what lies waiting in the ancient tomb, seemingly not entered by anyone for thousands of years!

Controls:
WASD = Move
Move Mouse = Look around
Left Mouse Click = Interact
Right Mouse Click = Ready/hide brush (allows for brushing away dust from dirty walls when ready)
Space = Jump
Ctrl = Crouch
Shift = Run

Current main objective: Find the three statues in the labyrinth and bring them back into the main hall.
